system.effect: The target's leg endures horrific burn damage, fusing clothing and armour with flesh and bone. The target suffers 1 level of Fatigue and is knocked Prone. Reduce his Movement by half (rounding up) for [[2d10]] rounds.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Leg (Severity 5)

The target's leg endures horrific burn damage, fusing clothing and armour with flesh and bone. The target suffers 1 level of Fatigue and is knocked Prone. Reduce his Movement by half (rounding up) for [[2d10]] rounds.
